column5: I have a 16' aluminum.  I would like to troll the lower notty and the rivermouth for bows.  Also maybe try anchoring and drifting roe. Can someone tell me how far up the notty i can troll before it gets to shallow or hazardous?  I have trolled the lower section below the first bridge and the mouth.  It doesnt get much deeper than 6' give or take.  Ill be using my electric for trolling.  thanks
Just over the main bridge (at the beaches) ,about 1/2 a km you will see a launch,right across from the LCBO.Head towards the bay from there.
Thats where i have launched from before but have only fished from there to the mouth.  Is it safe to take the boat further upstream?
Why not leave yer boat at home and fish the OX BOWS. Travel along the main street south side of the river.Before you get to the the big bridge,make a left,at the water tower.Follow the road .

If there is nothing in the river then id like to fish the mouth, on the bay, flatlining. Ive done well this time of year back to my original question is it safe to take a boat upstream from the launch?
It,s safe to go. Look forward to your report.
